div.bibl: Saloniki-Greek Press, Feb. 14, 1935. [YOUNG ATTORNEY ASSIGNED TO OFFICE]

body.p: We are happy to announce that Attorney James A. Geroulis has been made Special Assistant Prosecuting Attorney of the Grand Jury of the city of Chicago.

Mr. Geroulis is a member of our younger generation. He studied at the Socrates Greek School, and is as well versed in the Greek language as in the English. He gives evidence of being destined for an even higher office.
